name: Volcanic Ashecream
entries: Ingredients: x1 Uncommon Meat(cold resistance), x1 Harmony Cap, x1 Remedial Herb
Effect: You gain a +1 bonus to Strength saves and can use your reaction to increase a Strength attack or ability check by +5 bonus. Once you use this reaction you lose all the bonuses of this meal.

description.chatFlavor: +1 Str saves, reaction for +5 to Str atk/check (once).
